name: Wassernaturspielplatz "Brindlang"
description: Wood and stone were used to build the new natural adventure playground in Mayrhofen. Numerous wooden gutters - the so called "Brindlang" - channel, pool or dam the element of water throughout the entire premises. The products and services on offer are rounded off by a sand pit and a water-powered mill wheel - which are guaranteed to get children's hearts's racing. Situated at the heart of the Scheuling Forest, this new playground is the ideal excursion destination for the whole familiy.
